Methods

ChannelFinished(Mix_ChannelFinishedCallback)

Sets a callback that runs when a channel has finished playing.

public static void ChannelFinished(Mixer.Mix_ChannelFinishedCallback channelFinishedCallback)

Parameters

channelFinishedCallback Mixer.Mix_ChannelFinishedCallback

The callback function to be invoked when a channel finishes playing.

Remarks

This method ensures that the callback is properly registered and provides a layer of abstraction over the native method to make it less trivial.

CloseAudio()

Closes the currently open audio device, halting all playback.

public static void CloseAudio()

Remarks

This triggers any registered channel and music finished callbacks. Ensure all Chunk and Music objects are disposed before calling.

Initialize(MixInit)

Initializes SDL3_mixer with the specified audio format support.

public static Mixer.MixInit Initialize(Mixer.MixInit flags)

Parameters

flags Mixer.MixInit

Flags indicating which audio formats to initialize (e.g., MixInit.MIX_INIT_WAV).

Returns

Mixer.MixInit

The flags that were successfully initialized.

Remarks

Call this before opening an audio device to ensure support for specific audio formats. You can call this multiple times to initialize additional formats. Use Quit() to deinitialize when done.

Exceptions

SdlException

Thrown if initialization fails for any requested flags.

LoadMusic(string)

Loads a music object from a file.

public static Music LoadMusic(string filePath)

Parameters

filePath string

The path to the music file (e.g., MP3, OGG).

Returns

Music

A Music object representing the loaded music.

Remarks

Dispose of the returned Music when no longer needed.

Exceptions

SdlException

Thrown if the file cannot be loaded.

LoadWav(string)

Loads an audio chunk from a file.

public static Chunk LoadWav(string filePath)

Parameters

filePath string

The path to the audio file (e.g., WAV).

Returns

Chunk

A Chunk object representing the loaded audio.

Remarks

Dispose of the returned Chunk when no longer needed.

Exceptions

ArgumentNullException

Thrown if the file path is null or empty.

SdlException

Thrown if the file cannot be loaded.

MixerVersionAtLeast(int, int, int)

Checks if the compiled SDL3_mixer version is at least the specified version.

public static bool MixerVersionAtLeast(int major, int minor, int micro)

Parameters

major int

The major version to check.

minor int

The minor version to check.

micro int

The micro version to check.

Returns

bool

True if the compiled version is at least the specified version; otherwise, false.

OpenAudio(AudioDeviceId, AudioSpec?)

Opens an audio device for playback with the specified settings.

public static void OpenAudio(AudioDeviceId deviceId, AudioSpec? spec = null)

Parameters

deviceId AudioDeviceId

The ID of the audio device to open, or 0 for the default device.

spec AudioSpec?

The desired audio specification, or null for default settings.

Remarks

Call CloseAudio() when done to close the device. If spec is null, SDL3_mixer uses reasonable defaults.

Exceptions

SdlException

Thrown if the audio device cannot be opened.

PlayChannel(Chunk, int, int)

Plays an audio chunk on a specific channel or the first available channel.

public static int PlayChannel(Chunk chunk, int loops, int channel = -1)

Parameters

chunk Chunk

The Chunk to play.

loops int

The number of times to loop the sound (-1 for infinite, 0 for once).

channel int

The channel to play on, or -1 for the first available channel.

Returns

int

The channel used for playback, or -1 if no channel was available.

Exceptions

SdlException

Thrown if playback fails.

PlayChannel(int, Chunk, int) 

public static int PlayChannel(int channel, Chunk chunk, int loops)

chunk Chunk
loops int

PlayMusic(Music, int)

Plays a music object.

public static bool PlayMusic(Music music, int loops)

Parameters

music Music

The Music to play.

loops int

The number of times to loop the music (0 for once, -1 for infinite).

Returns

bool

Remarks

Only one music object can play at a time. This halts any currently playing music.

Exceptions

ArgumentNullException

Thrown if music is null.

SdlException

Thrown if playback fails.

PlayMusic(nint, int) 

public static bool PlayMusic(nint music, int loops)

music nint
loops int

Returns

bool

Playing(int) 

public static int Playing(int channel)

Parameters

channel int

Returns

int

PlayingMusic() 

public static bool PlayingMusic()

Returns

bool

Quit()

Deinitializes SDL3_mixer, unloading all audio format support.

public static void Quit()

Remarks

Call this after closing all audio devices and freeing resources. This method is safe to call multiple times.

RegisterEffect(int, Mix_EffectFunc_t, Mix_EffectDone_t, nint)

Registers a custom audio effect for a channel or the final mix.

public static void RegisterEffect(int channel, Mixer.Mix_EffectFunc_t effect, Mixer.Mix_EffectDone_t done, nint userData)

Parameters

channel int

The channel to apply the effect to, or MIX_CHANNEL_POST for the final mix.

effect Mixer.Mix_EffectFunc_t

The effect callback that processes audio data.

done Mixer.Mix_EffectDone_t

The callback invoked when the effect is unregistered (optional).

userData nint

User-defined data passed to the callbacks.

Remarks

The effect callback must be kept alive for the duration of its use.

Exceptions

SdlException

Thrown if the effect cannot be registered.

SetMusicPosition(double) 

public static bool SetMusicPosition(double position)

Returns

bool

SetPanning(int, byte, byte)

Sets the stereo panning for a specific channel or the final mix.

public static void SetPanning(int channel, byte left, byte right)

Parameters

channel int

The channel to apply panning to, or MIX_CHANNEL_POST for the final mix.

left byte

The volume of the left channel (0 to 255, where 0 is silent and 255 is full volume).

right byte

The volume of the right channel (0 to 255, where 0 is silent and 255 is full volume).

Remarks

This has no effect if the audio device is not in stereo mode.

Exceptions

SdlException

Thrown if panning cannot be set.
